code: import i18n from"i18next";import{initReactI18next}from"react-i18next";import LangFr from"./translations/fr.json";import LangEn from"./translations/en.json";var getStoredLanguage=function getStoredLanguage(){return localStorage.getItem("i18nLng")||"fr";};i18n.use(initReactI18next).init({resources:{en:LangEn,fr:LangFr},lng:getStoredLanguage(),fallbackLng:"en",interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export var changeLanguage=function changeLanguage(lng){i18n.changeLanguage(lng);localStorage.setItem("i18nLng",lng);};export default i18n;
